Name: Praecocia Cocktail
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Punt E Mes vermouth amaro
7.5 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: Bourbon and apricot are a well-established match, and everybody who drinks Manhattan's will recognise how well sweet vermouth and bitters work with bourbon. Hence, it's perhaps not surprising that this spirit-forward cocktail is delicious.
History: Created in 2010 by Jamie Boudreau at Vessel, Seattle, USA. Jamie describes his 1½ spirit to ¾ vermouth and ¼ modifier as the "Mister Potato Head of Ratios."
Nutrition: One serving of Praecocia Cocktail contains 160 calories
